text: Ogooué-Lolo is a province in Gabon. The provincial capital is Koulamoutou. == Departments == There are four departments: * Lolo-Bouenguidi Department (Koulamoutou) * Lombo-Bouenguidi Department (Pana) * Mouloundou Department (Lastoursville) * Offoué-Onoye Department (Iboundji) == References == Category:Provinces of Gabon
title: Ogooué-Lolo Province
